member.summary: Check quality of the resulting capture.

member.summary: Function to capture a finger. Always get status first and calibrate or wait if necessary. Always check status and capture errors.

member.name: P:Delta_ERP.My.Resources.Resources.PP_AverageRequirementsByBusiness
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to SELECT M.Material,MB.Board,SC.[Date] AS DeliveryDate,CASE WHEN DATEPART(WEEKDAY,SC.Date) IN ({0},{1}) THEN 0 ELSE FLOOR(ISNULL(OpenQuantity,0)/{2}) END AS OpenQuantity FROM Sys_Calendar AS SC CROSS JOIN Sch_Materials AS M INNER JOIN Sch_MaterialBoards AS MB ON M.Material = MB.Material INNER JOIN Mfg_Boards AS B ON MB.Board = B.Board LEFT OUTER JOIN vw_Sch_WeeklyCustomerRequirements AS CR ON M.Material = CR.Material AND SC.[Week] = CR.[Week] WHERE (('{3}' BETWEEN StartProduction AND EndProduction) OR ('{ [rest of string was truncated]";.

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to SELECT M.Material,MB.Board,SC.[Date] AS DeliveryDate,CASE WHEN DATEPART(WEEKDAY,SC.Date) IN ({0},{1}) THEN 0 ELSE FLOOR(ISNULL(OpenQuantity,0)/{2}) END AS OpenQuantity FROM Sys_Calendar AS SC CROSS JOIN Sch_Materials AS M INNER JOIN Sch_MaterialBoards AS MB ON M.Material = MB.Material INNER JOIN Mfg_Boards AS Bd ON MB.Board = Bd.Board LEFT OUTER JOIN vw_Sch_WeeklyCustomerRequirements AS CR ON M.Material = CR.Material AND SC.[Week] = CR.[Week] INNER JOIN Sch_Business AS B ON M.Business = B.Business WHE [rest of string was truncated]";.

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to SELECT M.Material,MB.Board,SC.[Date],ISNULL(SC.WorkingShifts,'') AS DayShifts,Bd.ShiftCombination AS BoardShifts,CL.Seconds FROM Sys_Calendar AS SC LEFT OUTER JOIN Sys_ShiftCombination AS SF ON SC.WorkingShifts = SF.Combination CROSS JOIN Sch_Materials AS M INNER JOIN Sch_MaterialBoards AS MB ON M.Material = MB.Material INNER JOIN Mfg_Boards AS Bd ON MB.Board = Bd.Board INNER JOIN Eng_1719Controls AS CL ON M.Material = CL.Material INNER JOIN Sys_ShiftCombination AS SFB ON Bd.ShiftCombination = SFB. [rest of string was truncated]";.

member.name: P:Delta_ERP.My.Resources.Resources.PP_ByBusiness
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to SELECT M.Material,M.Class,MB.Board,SC.[Date],DATENAME(W,SC.[Date]) AS WeekDay,ISNULL(Quantity,0) AS Quantity FROM Sys_Calendar AS SC CROSS JOIN Sch_Materials AS M INNER JOIN Sch_MaterialBoards AS MB ON M.Material = MB.Material INNER JOIN Mfg_Boards AS B ON MB.Board = B.Board LEFT OUTER JOIN Sch_DailyProductionPlan AS PP ON M.Material = PP.Material AND SC.[Date] = PP.[Date] WHERE SC.[Date] BETWEEN '{0}' AND '{1}' AND M.Business = '{2}' AND (('{0}' BETWEEN StartProduction AND EndProduction) OR ('{1} [rest of string was truncated]";.

member.name: P:Delta_ERP.My.Resources.Resources.PP_ByFamily
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to SELECT M.Material,M.Class,MB.Board,SC.[Date],DATENAME(W,SC.[Date]) AS WeekDay,ISNULL(Quantity,0) AS Quantity FROM Sys_Calendar AS SC CROSS JOIN Sch_Materials AS M INNER JOIN Sch_MaterialBoards AS MB ON M.Material = MB.Material INNER JOIN Mfg_Boards AS Bd ON MB.Board = Bd.Board INNER JOIN Sch_Business AS B ON M.Business = B.Business LEFT OUTER JOIN Sch_DailyProductionPlan AS PP ON M.Material = PP.Material AND SC.[Date] = PP.[Date] WHERE SC.[Date] BETWEEN '{0}' AND '{1}' AND B.Family = '{2}' AND ((' [rest of string was truncated]";.

member.name: P:Delta_ERP.My.Resources.Resources.PP_CommentsByBusiness
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to SELECT M.Material,MB.Board,C.Comment FROM Sch_Materials AS M INNER JOIN Sch_MaterialBoards AS MB ON M.Material = MB.Material INNER JOIN Mfg_Boards AS B ON MB.Board = B.Board INNER JOIN Sch_DailyProductionPlanComments AS C ON M.Material = C.Material AND MB.Board = C.Board WHERE (('{0}' BETWEEN StartProduction AND EndProduction) OR ('{1}' BETWEEN StartProduction AND EndProduction)) AND M.Business = '{2}' AND B.Volume='Low' ORDER BY M.Material.

member.name: P:Delta_ERP.My.Resources.Resources.PP_CommentsByFamily
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to SELECT M.Material,MB.Board,C.Comment FROM Sch_Materials AS M INNER JOIN Sch_MaterialBoards AS MB ON M.Material = MB.Material INNER JOIN Mfg_Boards AS Bd ON MB.Board = Bd.Board INNER JOIN Sch_DailyProductionPlanComments AS C ON M.Material = C.Material AND MB.Board = C.Board INNER JOIN Sch_Business AS B ON M.Business = B.Business WHERE (('{0}' BETWEEN StartProduction AND EndProduction) OR ('{1}' BETWEEN StartProduction AND EndProduction)) AND B.Family = '{2}' AND Bd.Volume='Low' ORDER BY M.Material.

member.name: P:Delta_ERP.My.Resources.Resources.PP_Daily_Plant
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to SELECT M.Material,Bd.Board,SC.[Date],DATENAME(W,SC.[Date]) AS WeekDay,ISNULL(Quantity,0) AS Quantity FROM Sys_Calendar AS SC CROSS JOIN Sch_Materials AS M INNER JOIN Sch_MaterialBoards AS Bd ON M.Material = Bd.Material LEFT OUTER JOIN Sch_DailyProductionPlan AS PP ON M.Material = PP.Material AND SC.[Date] = PP.[Date] WHERE SC.[Date] BETWEEN '{0}' AND '{1}' AND (('{0}' BETWEEN StartProduction AND EndProduction) OR ('{1}' BETWEEN StartProduction AND EndProduction)) ORDER BY M.Material,SC.[Date].
